blackjack

Class CardDistributor

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.CardDistributor

  • public class CardDistributor
extends java.lang.Object
    CardDistributor will manage the 52 card deck and the hands of the player and dealer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardDistributor()
      CardDistributor constructor will initialize the list of listeners, deck of cards, player/dealer hands, and randomizer object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
      addChangeListener will add the listener to the listeners list that will be notified when the game is over
      void calcResult()
      calcResult will calculate the result of the game based on the dealer and player totals
      void gameReset()
      gameReset will clear deck, player hand, dealer hand and initialize new cards again
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> getDealerHand()
      getDealerHand will return the dealer's hand
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> getPlayerHand()
      getPlayerHand will return the player's hand
      java.lang.String getResult()
      getResult will return the result of the game
      int getTotal(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
      getTotal will calculate the total of the inputted hand
      void initialization()
      initialization will create the deck of cards containing 4 of each card face also initializes player and dealer hands by removing two cards for each hand at a random index
      void playDealer()
      playDealer will play out the rest of the dealer's hand by hitting until the dealers hand is greater than 17
      void playerHit()
      playerHit will add another card to the players hand by removing a random index from the deck if the resulting total of the player hand is over 21 then the player folds and the result is calculated

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardDistributor

        public CardDistributor()
        CardDistributor constructor will initialize the list of listeners, deck of cards, player/dealer hands, and randomizer object

    • Method Detail

      • initialization

        public void initialization()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        initialization will create the deck of cards containing 4 of each card face also initializes player and dealer hands by removing two cards for each hand at a random index
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the character for a new card is invalid

      • playerHit

        public void playerHit()
        playerHit will add another card to the players hand by removing a random index from the deck if the resulting total of the player hand is over 21 then the player folds and the result is calculated

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        getTotal will calculate the total of the inputted hand
        Parameters:
        cards - is the specified hand that needs to be calculated
        Returns:
        total of the hand as an integer

      • playDealer

        public void playDealer()
        playDealer will play out the rest of the dealer's hand by hitting until the dealers hand is greater than 17

      • gameReset

        public void gameReset()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        gameReset will clear deck, player hand, dealer hand and initialize new cards again
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - will be thrown if an invalid character is inputted when deck is created

      • calcResult

        public void calcResult()
        calcResult will calculate the result of the game based on the dealer and player totals

      • getPlayerHand

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getPlayerHand()
        getPlayerHand will return the player's hand
        Returns:
        player's hand as an ArrayList

      • getDealerHand

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getDealerHand()
        getDealerHand will return the dealer's hand
        Returns:
        dealer's hand as an ArrayList

      • getResult

        public java.lang.String getResult()
        getResult will return the result of the game
        Returns:
        result is the restult of the game as a string

      • addChangeListener

        public void addChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
        addChangeListener will add the listener to the listeners list that will be notified when the game is over
        Parameters:
        listener - is a listener object to be added to the list of listeners
